# canPlayType

**Instance Method**

Returns whether the media element supports the specified MIME type.

## Declaration

```swift
DOMString canPlayType(
    DOMString type
);
```

## Return Value

The possible string values are: “no”, “probably” and “maybe”.

## Controlling Playback

- **load**: Starts loading the media resource.
- **pause**: Pauses the media playback if in progress.
- **play**: Begins playing the media resource.

items.description: Pauses the media playback if in progress.
